turns.zh: 我们现在可以讨论了是吧
turns.en: We can discuss it now, right?

turns.zh: 庭审结束了，我们可以讨论了
turns.en: The court hearing is over, we can discuss it.
turns.wrong_zh: 庭魔结束了，我们可以讨论了

turns.zh: 是的，可以讨论
turns.en: Yes, we can.
turns.full_zh: 是的，我们可以讨论

turns.zh: 还可以骂街，想做什么都行
turns.en: And we can curse in public, do whatever we want.
turns.full_zh: 我们还可以骂街，我们想做什么都行

turns.zh: 那么大家去下洗手间,回来再进入正题
turns.en: So everybody can go to the bathroom now, we'll get right to the point after that.

turns.zh: 我们要多花些钱
turns.en: We need to spend more money.

turns.zh: 请一个更好的弹道专家
turns.en: on a better ballistic expert.

turns.zh: 拜托你了，可以吗
turns.en: Please, can we?

turns.zh: 花多少都行
turns.en: I don't care about the expense.

turns.zh: 我就这么一个孩子
turns.en: I have only one kid.

turns.zh: 我不知道是否该让比安卡作证
turns.en: I don't know if I should ask Bianca to testify.

turns.zh: 你准备好盘问比安卡了吗
turns.en: Are you ready to interrogate Bianca?

turns.zh: 我。。。是的
turns.en: I'm...ready.

turns.zh: 如果这么做会让她很难过的
turns.en: It would made her sad.

turns.zh: 比安卡和她母亲要和我们谈谈
turns.en: Bianca and her mother wanna talk to us.

turns.zh: 天啊
turns.en: Oh my god.

turns.zh: 凯里在哪儿 得找他来
turns.en: Where's Kerry? We need to find him.
turns.full_zh: 凯里在哪儿 我们得找他来

turns.zh: 为什么
turns.en: Why?

turns.zh: 只有凯里能和她谈谈
turns.en: Only Kerry can talk to her.

turns.zh: 乖点听爸爸的话
turns.en: Behave yourself and listen to daddy.

turns.zh: 今晚见
turns.en: I'll see you tonight.
turns.full_zh: 今晚见你

turns.zh: 我不能送孩子们上学
turns.en: I can't take the children to school.

turns.zh: 一直都是你送的
turns.en: You are always the one who take the children to school.

turns.zh: 我今天必须早上班
turns.en: I have to go to work early today.

turns.zh: 现在就在上班了 也太早了
turns.en: Now? Isn't it too early?

turns.zh: 这不是胡安妮塔的错
turns.en: It's not Juanita's fault.

turns.zh: 你不要怪她
turns.en: Don't blame her.

turns.zh: 要怪就怪她父母
turns.en: You should blame her parents.
turns.full_zh: 你要怪就怪她父母
turns.wrong_zh: 要怪舅怪她父母

turns.zh: 只是可怜了胡安妮塔这个孩子
turns.en: Poor Juanita.

turns.zh: 这家商店怎么停电了
turns.en: Why is this shop out of power?

turns.zh: 不好意思 先生
turns.en: Sorry, sir.

turns.zh: 没关系
turns.en: It's okay.

turns.zh: 是没付电费吧
turns.en: Didn't you pay the electricity bill?
turns.full_zh: 你是没付电费吧

turns.zh: 保险柜你找到了没
turns.en: Have you found the safe box?

turns.zh: 我已经等不及了
turns.en: I can't wait.

turns.zh: 找到了
turns.en: Yes, I have.
turns.full_zh: 我找到了

turns.zh: 已经打开了
turns.en: And I've already opened it.
turns.full_zh: 我已经打开了

turns.zh: 圣经凭空消失了 无迹可寻
turns.en: The Bible just gone with no trace.

turns.zh: 让警察到那个教区核对指纹
turns.en: Have the police check fingerprints in that parish.

turns.zh: 我预感会有所收获的
turns.en: I think we'll find out something.
turns.full_zh: 我预感我们会有所收获的

turns.zh: 可为什么要偷圣经呢
turns.en: But why would anyone wanna stole the Bible?

turns.zh: 她怎么了
turns.en: What happened to her?

turns.zh: 是不是哭了
turns.en: Is she crying?
turns.full_zh: 她是不是哭了

turns.zh: 是啊
turns.en: Yeah.

turns.zh: 弄得我焦头烂额
turns.en: She drives me crazy.
turns.full_zh: 她弄得我焦头烂额

turns.zh: 除了见不得女人落泪 其他的事我都能搞定
turns.en: I can handle everything except a crying woman.

turns.zh: 话说找他喝酒的那个女人是谁啊
turns.en: Who's the woman asked him to drink?

turns.zh: 我不认识 只知道是个记者
turns.en: I don't know her. I only know she's a journalist.
turns.full_zh: 我不认识她 只知道是个记者

turns.zh: 她跟着约翰一起采访
turns.en: She followed John in the interview.

turns.zh: 想找他做个跟踪报道
turns.en: She wanted to ask him to do a follow-up story.
turns.full_zh: 她想找他做个跟踪报道

turns.zh: 来了一辆豪车
turns.en: Here comes a luxury car.

turns.zh: 天呐 那司机看起来真眼熟
turns.en: Oh my god. The driver looks familiar.

turns.zh: 是我们的人吗
turns.en: Does he belong to us?
turns.full_zh: 他是我们的人吗

turns.zh: 没错 他叫山姆
turns.en: Yes, he's Sam.

turns.zh: 别紧张 他人不错
turns.en: Relax. He's nice.

turns.zh: 你怎么无精打采的 谁招惹你了
turns.en: Why are you so down? What happened?

turns.zh: 太无聊了
turns.en: I'm so bored.

turns.zh: 得整天盯着一大堆文件看
turns.en: I need to spend time with a pile of papers entire day.
turns.full_zh: 我得整天盯着一大堆文件看

turns.zh: 尼尔检查了杜兰的所有信息
turns.en: Neil's checked all the informations of Duran.

turns.zh: 他清白得出人意料
turns.en: He was unexpectedlly innocent.

turns.zh: 当然是了
turns.en: Of course.

turns.zh: 你怎么能怀疑杜兰呢
turns.en: How can you doubt Duran?

turns.zh: 他从来不会撒谎
turns.en: He would never lie.

turns.zh: 也许确实如此
turns.en: Maybe you're right.

turns.zh: 我叫尼克 我想做你的股票经纪人
turns.en: I'm Nick, I wanna be your stockbroker.

turns.zh: 我有经纪人了
turns.en: I've already got a stockbroker.

turns.zh: 是吗 他干的怎么样
turns.en: Really? How's his work?

turns.zh: 去年给你赚钱了吗
turns.en: Has he made you money last year?
turns.full_zh: 去年他给你赚钱了吗

turns.zh: 去年经济危机 谁赚钱了啊
turns.en: The economic crisis was in last year, nobody could make money.

turns.zh: 你在庆祝什么
turns.en: What are you celebrating?

turns.zh: 我们还有几场比赛
turns.en: We've got few games left.

turns.zh: 下个礼拜才有得可庆祝
turns.en: We have nothing to celebrate until next week.
turns.full_zh: 下个礼拜我们才有得可庆祝
turns.wrong_zh: 下个礼拜才酉得可庆祝

turns.zh: 我们只是想放松一下
turns.en: We just want to have a relax.

turns.zh: 我觉得大家的努力工作 值得这点小小的奖励
turns.en: I think our hard work deserves a little reward.

turns.zh: 琼斯在吗 找他帮个忙
turns.en: Is Jones there? I need him to do me a favor.
turns.full_zh: 琼斯在吗 我找他帮个忙

turns.zh: 不在 找他帮什么忙
turns.en: He's not here. What do you need from him?
turns.full_zh: 不在 你找他帮什么忙

turns.zh: 帮我查一下这上面的指纹
turns.en: Check the fingerprints on this for me.

turns.zh: 看看能不能找到指纹的主人
turns.en: See if we can find the owner of these fingerprints.

turns.zh: 好吧 琼斯出去了 明天再来找他吧
turns.en: Okay, Jones's out. You can find him tomorrow.

turns.zh: 这是我的搜查令
turns.en: Here's my search warrant.

turns.zh: 你来这里找谁
turns.en: Who are you looking for?

turns.zh: 找叫做格蕾丝的经销商
turns.en: I want to find a dealer named Grace,
turns.full_zh: 我找叫做格蕾丝的经销商

turns.zh: 她经营一间高档的酒窖
turns.en: who runs a upscale wine cellar.
turns.wrong_zh: 她经盈一间膏档的酒窖

turns.zh: 我要通过格蕾丝找到她的父亲
turns.en: I need to find her father through Grace.

turns.zh: 我准备举办一场私人品酒派对
turns.en: I'm going to hold a private wine tasting party.

turns.zh: 你可以邀请你的朋友来吗
turns.en: Can you invite your friends?

turns.zh: 你可以直接联系他
turns.en: You can contact him directly.

turns.zh: 我的朋友是个谨慎的人
turns.en: My friend is a cautious person.

turns.zh: 如果能亲自告诉他更多情况 他就会来了
turns.en: He'll come if you'd tell him more information in person.
turns.full_zh: 如果你能亲自告诉他更多情况 他就会来了

turns.zh: 里面没人 那个混蛋一定看到我们来了
turns.en: No one's there. That jerk must have seen us.

turns.zh: 监控显示他已经逃离了现场
turns.en: The monitoring shows that he's fled the scene.

turns.zh: 在我们封锁大楼前两分钟开了另一辆车逃了
turns.en: He's drove away just two minutes before we blocked the building.
turns.full_zh: 他在我们封锁大楼前两分钟开了另一辆车逃了

turns.zh: 这么说你完全不知道他在哪里咯
turns.en: So you have no idea where he is.

turns.zh: 我们正用交通摄像机监控他的行踪
turns.en: We're monitoring him through a traffic camera.

turns.zh: 他都来不及带上他的笔记本
turns.en: He didn't even have time to grab his noteook.

turns.zh: 我得找艾薇谈一谈
turns.en: I need to talk to Ivy.

turns.zh: 自从上次之后她就不理我了
turns.en: She hasn't talked to me since last time.

turns.zh: 抱歉 艾薇最近心情不太好 实在没心情谈话
turns.en: Sorry, Ivy's not been in a good mood recently. She's not in the mood of talking.
turns.full_zh: 抱歉 艾薇最近心情不太好 她实在没心情谈话

turns.zh: 得了奖也没心情吗
turns.en: Even after winning the prize?

turns.zh: 她最近可是得了大奖呢
turns.en: She won a big prize recently.

turns.zh: 没办法 我有时也会这样
turns.en: These things happen. So am I sometimes.

turns.zh: 这是瑞安 认识他吗
turns.en: It's Ryan, do you know him?
turns.full_zh: 这是瑞安 你认识他吗

turns.zh: 认识 他手下有个小工厂 经常生产一些儿童玩具
turns.en: Yeah, he owns a small factory which products children's toys.

turns.zh: 市里的商店经常找他合作
turns.en: The shopkeepers in the city often ask him for cooperation.

turns.zh: 尼尔和他合作过吗
turns.en: Has Neil ever cooperated with him?

turns.zh: 算是试着合作过一次吧
turns.en: Well, they tried to work together once.
turns.full_zh: 他们算是试着合作过一次吧

turns.zh: 瑞安和尼尔现在已经是好友了
turns.en: Now Ryan and Neil are friends.

turns.zh: 总部那边有消息了吗
turns.en: Any information from the head office?

turns.zh: 情报科那边查到了
turns.en: Intelligence has got it.

turns.zh: 查到了什么
turns.en: What did they get?
turns.full_zh: 他们查到了什么

turns.zh: 查到了餐馆的监控录像
turns.en: The surveillance video of the restaurant.

turns.zh: 干得不错 查到的人多半是威克斯
turns.en: Good job. It's probably Vix who found it.

turns.zh: 彼得 你怎么过来了
turns.en: Peter, why are you here?

turns.zh: 我正好在附近购物呢
turns.en: I happened to go shopping nearby.

turns.zh: 就顺便过来邀请你参加明天的party
turns.en: I just drop by and invite you to tomorrow's party.
turns.full_zh: 我就顺便过来邀请你参加明天的party

turns.zh: 对了 你知道珍妮在家吗
turns.en: By the way, is Jenny at home?

turns.zh: 我待会儿就去邀请
turns.en: I'll invite her later.
turns.full_zh: 我待会儿就去邀请她

turns.zh: 在的 明天见
turns.en: Yeah, I'll see you tomorrow.
turns.full_zh: 在的 明天见你

turns.zh: 吉米怎么了
turns.en: What happened to Jim?

turns.zh: 考试作弊被老师抓住了
turns.en: He was caught cheating by his teacher in a test.
turns.full_zh: 他考试作弊被老师抓住了

turns.zh: 真不敢相信还会作弊
turns.en: I can't believe that he cheated!
turns.full_zh: 我真不敢相信他还会作弊
turns.wrong_zh: 真不敢相信还汇作弊

turns.zh: 他成绩一直都挺不错的
turns.en: His grades've always been great.

turns.zh: 是啊 吉米让老师很失望
turns.en: Yeah, Jim lets his teacher down.

turns.zh: 我最近买了几幅油画 给你看看
turns.en: I've brought some oil paintings recently, I'll show you.

turns.zh: 都是假的
turns.en: All of them are fake.

turns.zh: 都是吗 你怎么知道
turns.en: All? How did you know?

turns.zh: 真品都有特殊的防伪标记
turns.en: The real painting has a special security mark.

turns.zh: 我之前听专家讲过
turns.en: I‘ve heard it from a expert.

turns.zh: 很久没看到你这么高兴了
turns.en: I haven't seen you so happy for a long time.
turns.full_zh: 我很久没看到你这么高兴了

turns.zh: 你看看 乐的嘴都合不上了
turns.en: Look at you, you're grinning your head off.

turns.zh: 因为今天天气不错
turns.en: Because it's a nice day.

turns.zh: 明明是得意有人给你写了情书
turns.en: Obviously, it's because that you've received a love letter.

turns.zh: 好吧 情书确实会让人很开心
turns.en: Fine, but love letters do make people happy.

turns.zh: 她最近怎么了
turns.en: What happened to her recently?

turns.zh: 有人在找她 好像不怀好意
turns.en: Someone with bad intentions is looking for her.

turns.zh: 她知道是谁吗
turns.en: Does she know who it is?

turns.zh: 不知道 不过那些人势力很大
turns.en: No, she doesn't, but they're powerful.
turns.full_zh: 她不知道 不过那些人势力很大

turns.zh: 而且差不多快找到她了
turns.en: And they almost find her.
turns.full_zh: 而且他们差不多快找到她了

turns.zh: 我们有什么能帮助她的吗
turns.en: Is there anything we can do for her?

turns.zh: 哇 这幅画是谁画的 简直太棒了
turns.en: Wow, who painted this picture? It's amazing.

turns.zh: 是贾斯汀
turns.en: Justin.

turns.zh: 贾斯汀真不简单
turns.en: Justin is terrific.

turns.zh: 以后要是需要画画绝对找他
turns.en: I'll find him if I need pictures in the future.
turns.full_zh: 以后我要是需要画画绝对找他

turns.zh: 没错 我也是
turns.en: Yeah, me too.

turns.zh: 我们的新律所需要一间办公室
turns.en: We need an office in our new law firm.

turns.zh: 是的 我最近就在忙这个
turns.en: Yes, I've been working on this recently.

turns.zh: 找到了吗
turns.en: Did you find it?
turns.full_zh: 你找到了吗

turns.zh: 正找着呢
turns.en: I'm looking for it.
turns.full_zh: 我正找着呢

turns.zh: 但没有证书确实比较难找
turns.en: But it's really hard to find it without a certification.

turns.zh: 杰夫尼 这是怎么回事
turns.en: Jeffery, what's wrong with you?
turns.full_zh: 杰夫尼 你这是怎么回事

turns.zh: 什么意思 我怎么了
turns.en: What do you mean? Is there anything wrong with me?

turns.zh: 我的意思是你为什么要酒驾
turns.en: I mean, why are you drunk driving?

turns.zh: 这很危险 不知道吗
turns.en: It's dangerous, don't you know?
turns.full_zh: 这很危险 你不知道吗

turns.zh: 我没醉
turns.en: I'm not drunk.

turns.zh: 你这样就等着被捕吧
turns.en: You'll be arrested.

turns.zh: 今天我们有什么计划吗
turns.en: Do we have any plan for today?

turns.zh: 要不来打牌吧 外面天气不太好
turns.en: How about playing cards? The weather today is not very nice.

turns.zh: 现在就开始吗
turns.en: Now?

turns.zh: 再等等吧 丹尼还没来
turns.en: Wait, Danny's not here.

turns.zh: 他还有有个案子要处理
turns.en: He has a case to deal with.

turns.zh: 艾丽最近怎么样了
turns.en: How's Allie recently?

turns.zh: 我不知道 她已经不在我的律所了
turns.en: I don't know. She's not in my law firm anymore.

turns.zh: 什么 为什么走了
turns.en: What? Why did she leave?
turns.full_zh: 什么 她为什么走了

turns.zh: 开了自己的律所
turns.en: She opened her own law firm.
turns.full_zh: 她开了自己的律所

turns.zh: 什么时候的事
turns.en: When is it?

turns.zh: 大概三周之前吧
turns.en: About three weeks ago.

turns.zh: 海耶斯心脏病突发死亡了 知道吗
turns.en: Do you know that Hayes died of a heart attack?
turns.full_zh: 海耶斯心脏病突发死亡了 你知道吗

turns.zh: 我知道 但是威廉说这是谋杀
turns.en: I know. But William said it's a murder.

turns.zh: 怎么知道他是被谋杀的
turns.en: How does he know that?

turns.zh: 威廉看过海耶斯的检验报告
turns.en: William's read Hayes' inspection reports,

turns.zh: 报告显示他的血液里有药物成分
turns.en: which shows there were drug ingredients in his blood.

turns.zh: 彼得 喊安德鲁来吃饭了
turns.en: Peter, tell Andrew it's dinner time.

turns.zh: 安德鲁恐怕不会吃了
turns.en: I'm afraid that Andrew won't eat.

turns.zh: 他有什么事吗
turns.en: What is wrong with him?

turns.zh: 今晚要和同学去聚餐
turns.en: He's going to have dinner with his classmates tonight.
turns.full_zh: 今晚他要和同学去聚餐
turns.wrong_zh: 今晚要和同穴去聚餐

turns.zh: 噢 好吧
turns.en: Okay, fine.

turns.zh: 继续讲讲上次的故事吧
turns.en: Continue the story you told me last time.
turns.full_zh: 你继续讲讲上次的故事吧

turns.zh: 没问题 上次说到哪儿了
turns.en: No problem, where were we last time?
turns.full_zh: 没问题 我们上次说到哪儿了

turns.zh: 说到警方发出了拘捕令
turns.en: The police issued an arrest warrant.

turns.zh: 噢 想起来了
turns.en: Oh, right.
turns.wrong_zh: 噢 享起来了

turns.zh: 接下来就是故事的高潮了
turns.en: Here comes the climax of the story.

turns.zh: 今天我们有很多事情要做
turns.en: We have a lot of works to do today.
turns.wrong_zh: 今天我们友很多事情要做

turns.zh: 能开始了吗
turns.en: Can we start it now?
turns.full_zh: 我们能开始了吗

turns.zh: 来吧 首先你负责收集案件
turns.en: Come on, first of all, you're responsible for collecting cases.

turns.zh: 她将案件整理合并为报告
turns.en: She consolidated the cases into a report.

turns.zh: 下班之前装订好给我
turns.en: Bind them and give them to me before getting off work.

turns.zh: 彼得 来一个杯咖啡吧
turns.en: Peter, how about having a cup of coffee?

turns.zh: 多谢 我可能暂时不需要
turns.en: Thanks, I don't need coffee now.

turns.zh: 来一杯吧 等会儿就需要了
turns.en: Come on, you'll need it later.

你得把所有事情安排妥当

turns.en: Lucas is really a good lawyer.

turns.zh: 死者身上没有任何证件
turns.en: There's no identification on the victim.

turns.en: I don't know much about baseball.

turns.en: She went to catch Alice alone.

turns.en: Alice is cunning. You should go help her.

turns.en: Alice's hiding. I'm trying to figure out where she's possibly hiding.

turns.en: Any discoveries?

turns.en: For no reason? The show tomorrow is very important.

turns.en: Maybe I can be their interim music director.

turns.en: Yeah, I'll give it to my boss.

turns.en: Do you know whether he likes tea of coffee?

turns.en: As far as I know, he likes them all.

turns.en: Yeah, the dumplings there is great.

turns.en: How could that happen?

turns.en: Not now. Not then. When can I propose to her?

turns.en: She felt humiliated by Patty's arrival.

turns.en: The one next to John?

turns.full_zh: 是的 她怎么哭了呢

turns.full_zh: 这得问问约翰他是不是伤了别人的心

turns.full_zh: 难道她是联邦调查局的人

turns.full_zh: 你最近多多观察下她

turns.en: Tallinn Van der Sent

turns.full_zh: 我没听说过

turns.full_zh: 她是那间画廊的买家 她挺漂亮的人也不错

turns.en: In that case, don't blame me for my frequent visiting.

turns.en: I have to go. Matthew asked me go back to see him.

turns.en: Matthew blames me for not taking good care of his stuff.

turns.en: Why? It's his own problem.

turns.en: My job is to take care of these stuff while he's gone.

turns.en: My mom used to be mean to Sla, and she didn't allow me to date him.

turns.en: Why didn't you come with him? You can only get freedom by yourself.

turns.en: These clothes were found in the building. It's the same as the one Jones usually wears.

turns.en: Yeah, we can keep on investigating by the plate number.

turns.en: Not bad. I'm starving. Can I have some cookies?

turns.en: It's a piece of jade.

turns.en: Yeah, grandma made a lot of yummy foods for me.

turns.full_zh: 她给你什么吃的了

turns.en: She said that I couldn't tell you.

turns.en: My friends from the council said they were busy.

turns.en: Thanks for your help. You are awesome.

turns.en: Ha, it's my honor.

turns.en: May I come in?

turns.en: Only if your customer comes.

turns.en: Why me?

turns.en: The broken tie's never lied to me.

turns.zh: 为什么就不肯相信他改邪归正了呢

turns.zh: 很简单 因为这不是他的天性

turns.zh: 在坚持一段时间 一切就会风平浪静了

turns.zh: 我不想再吵了 很晚了

turns.en: I don't want him to fight. But every boy would learn how to swing his fist sooner or later.

turns.en: You know what? If you want him to win the advantage, you should teach him the capoeira.

turns.zh: 是一种巴西的武术舞蹈

turns.zh: 也许你可以考虑新职业了

turns.en: You're born suspicious.

turns.zh: 职业病而已 我只是喜欢万无一失
turns.en: It's just occupational disease. I just like to be safe.

turns.en: Only your money left.

turns.zh: 制作炸药的成分的购物发票
turns.en: shopping invoice for the ingredients of the explosive.

turns.zh: 上面写着买主叫做艾伦·博格斯
turns.en: It identified the buyer as Alan Burgess.

turns.zh: 你知道是谁吗
turns.en: Do you know who he is?
turns.full_zh: 你知道他是谁吗

turns.zh: 福勒的化名
turns.en: It's Fowler's alias.

turns.zh: 戴安追查他的购物记录时发现的
turns.en: Diane found it when she tracked down his shopping records.
turns.full_zh: 戴安追查他的购物记录时她发现的

turns.zh: 是在爆炸之前一周购买的
turns.en: It was purchased a week before the bombing.
turns.wrong_zh: 是在爆炸之前一周够买的

turns.zh: 福勒买了炸药 然后安装在飞机上
turns.en: Fowler buys explosives and installs them on the plane.

turns.zh: 你在找什么呢
turns.en: What are you looking for?

turns.zh: 醒酒液
turns.en: Sober-up Liquid.

turns.zh: 这东西可以清除宿醉 对吗
turns.en: This will clear up hangovers, right?
turns.wrong_zh: 这东西可以清楚宿醉 对吗

turns.zh: 天呐 我们简直把这里一扫而空
turns.en: My God. We just swept the place out!

turns.zh: 谁把兰姆酒喝了
turns.en: Who drank the rum?

turns.zh: 怪我
turns.en: I'm to blame.

turns.zh: 你觉得这些要花多少钱
turns.en: How much do you think these will cost?

turns.zh: 不用多少钱吧
turns.en: Not much, I suppose.
turns.wrong_zh: 不用多少前吧

turns.zh: 大概小几百块
turns.en: Maybe a few hundred.
turns.wrong_zh: 大概小几百快

turns.zh: 坏了 硬盘被烧了
turns.en: The hard drive is burned.

turns.zh: 我们只能恢复出一张农场的照片
turns.en: We can only recover one photograph of the farm.
turns.wrong_zh: 我们只能恢付出一张农场的照片

turns.zh: 可能是招聘广告上的
turns.en: It could be from a job advertisement.

turns.zh: 问题是 我们不知道是不是布鲁克斯打的广告
turns.en: The problem is we don't know if Brooks sent the advertisement.

turns.zh: 他有可能是求职的
turns.en: He might be looking for a job.

turns.zh: 好吧 我们分析一下这张照片
turns.en: OK, let's analyze this picture.

turns.zh: 看看能不能确定农场的位置
turns.en: See if we can locate the farm.
turns.full_zh: 看看我们能不能确定农场的位置

turns.zh: 或许这能帮我们确定凶手的身份
turns.en: Maybe it'll help us identify the killer.

turns.zh: 华盛顿大学是排名前十的学校
turns.en: The University of Washington is in the top 10.

turns.zh: 等等 你刚才是不是提到了华盛顿大学
turns.en: Wait a minute, did you mention the University of Washington?

turns.zh: 是啊
turns.en: Yes.

turns.zh: 华盛顿州西雅图市的那个吗
turns.en: Is it the one in Seattle, Washington?

turns.zh: 是啊 我知道学校不太理想
turns.en: Yes, I know it's not an ideal school.

turns.zh: 不理想的是地理位置
turns.en: What's not ideal is the location.
turns.wrong_zh: 不理想的是地里位置

turns.zh: 但这是唯一一个给我提供奖学金的学校
turns.en: But this is the only school that offered me a scholarship.

turns.zh: 能查查玛丽·比格斯比的车辆记录吗
turns.en: Can we check Mary Biggsby's car records?

turns.zh: 那个是玛丽吗
turns.en: Is that Mary?

turns.zh: 估计是
turns.en: Probably she is.
turns.full_zh: 估计是她

turns.zh: 找到了
turns.en: I found it!
turns.full_zh: 我找到了

turns.zh: 玛丽·比格斯比开的是一辆蓝色的小货车
turns.en: Mary Biggsby drove a blue pickup.

turns.zh: 这里的汽车牌照我们都登记了 会找到的
turns.en: We have registered all the license plates here. We'll find them.
turns.wrong_zh: 这里的汽车拍照我们都登记了 会找到的

turns.zh: 你玩过多久的棒球
turns.en: How long have you played baseball?

turns.zh: 我吗
turns.en: Me?

turns.zh: 是啊
turns.en: Yes.

turns.zh: 从没打过
turns.en: Never.

turns.zh: 你这身球衣很棒
turns.en: Your shirt is great.
turns.wrong_zh: 你这身秋依很棒

turns.zh: 这件是防水的
turns.en: This one is waterproof.

turns.zh: 聚乙烯纤维制成的单层外皮
turns.en: A single layer of leather made of polyethylene fibers.

turns.zh: 轻便又舒适
turns.en: Light and comfortable.

turns.zh: 因为它自身也有冷却性能
turns.en: Because it also has cooling properties.

turns.zh: 上身效果也很好
turns.en: When I wore it, I looked well.

turns.zh: 好奇怪 伊恩马上就能和梅丽莎逃走了
turns.en: I'm surprised that Ian will be able to run away with Melissa in no time.

turns.zh: 为什么还要自杀呢
turns.en: Why did he kill himself?
turns.full_zh: 为什么他还要自杀呢

turns.zh: 或许他意识到自己要被抓住了
turns.en: Maybe he realized that he was going to be caught.

turns.zh: 就算有梅丽莎的帮助
turns.en: Even with Melissa's help,

turns.zh: 他也躲不了一辈子
turns.en: he can't hide in his life.

turns.zh: 或许他走投无路了
turns.en: Maybe he's cornered.
turns.wrong_zh: 或许他走头无路了

turns.zh: 管伊恩那么多干嘛
turns.en: Whatever Ian does,

turns.zh: 现在重要的是 杀死艾丽的凶手死了
turns.en: what matters now is that Ellie's killer is dead.

turns.zh: 我们不再是疑犯了
turns.en: We're no longer suspects.

turns.zh: 为什么我没有解放的感觉
turns.en: Why didn't I feel liberated?

turns.zh: 你们和海伦·唐尼是什么关系
turns.en: What's your relationship with Helen Downey?

turns.zh: 我们是同一个女巫会的会员
turns.en: We are members of the same Witches Association.

turns.zh: 我一定要拿到其他九个人的名字
turns.en: I must get the names of the other nine.

turns.zh: 什么会
turns.en: What association?

turns.zh: 女巫会
turns.en: Witches Association.

turns.zh: 在中世纪也称之为女修道会
turns.en: In the Middle Ages it was also called a convent.
turns.wrong_zh: 在中世纪也成之为女修道会

turns.zh: 由13名女巫组成
turns.en: It's made up of 13 witches.
